attributes.action: Instantly withdraw from the European Union
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The European Union (EU) is slowly ruining this once great Country and if you want to save yourselves withdraw from this Facist organisation that dares to take our sovereignity from us and we the people are fed up with their ideas and would like an instant withdrawl.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
